pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Beta-Binomial Test for Count Data // The beta-binomial test is used for significance analysis of independent samples by Pham et al. (2010) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btp677. The inverted beta-binomial test is used for paired sample testing, e.g. pre-treatment and post-treatment data, by Pham and Jimenez (2012) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/bts394.
